body: SPRINGTIME has come to New York, with flowers of sunny yellow, sky blue and creamy white. To see them, head first for the Brooklyn Botanic Garden, where the magnificent collection of magnolias is in full bloom. The garden boasts one of the oldest and largest collections of these magnificent trees in the metropolitan area. Some of the 80 trees in
title: A SCENT OF SPRING AT PUBLIC GARDENS
